mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ONLINE_QNA ( MEM_IDX, NAME, EMAIL, HP, STORE_LOC, ZIPCODE, ADDR1, ADDR2, STOREYN, STORE_SPACE, FOUNDATION_TIME, FOUNDATION_COST, SELECT_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENTS, REGDT, RES_STATUS, MARKETING_AGREE, STORE_AGREE) VALUES ( #{currentMemId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{hp}, #{storeLoc}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{storeYn}, #{storeSpace}, #{foundationTime}, #{foundationCost}, #{selectType}, #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), 0, #{marketing_agree}, #{store_agree} )
